title: Work Day Planner
description: This project is a simple app that runs in the browser and features dynamically updated HTML and CSS powered by jQuery.

title: The Weather App
description: The Weather App is a functional app where you can see the five-day weather forecast for the city or town you plan to visit.

title: E-Business Backend
description: This program allows for full CRUD functionality of a databse containing 3 tables, categories, products and tags, in the backend.

title: Quotely
description: Quotely is an interactive dynamical application that allows users to create, read, update, and delete quotes.
